title: Coronation Street star Andrew Whyment 'signs up for I'm A Celebrity'
text:
Coronation Street star Andrew Whyment is said to have signed up for I’m A Celebrity (Picture: Getty Images)

Coronation Street star Andrew Whyment has reportedly signed up for I’m A Celebrity…Get Me Out Of Here!

Quite a few soap stars are rumoured for this year’s line-up, including Andy’s co-star Alan Halsall, but the Kirk Sutherland actor is said to have made the cut.

I’m A Celeb bosses are said to be ‘chuffed’ to have landed Andrew.

A source told The Sun: ‘Producers are really pleased with the line-up so far, with just a couple of faces to unveil.

‘They were chuffed to get Andrew as viewers have watched him on Coronation Street for the best part of two decades, yet know nothing about him away from Kirk.

‘Soap stars always do well on I’m a Celeb . . . so the producers have high hopes of Andrew.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

The 38-year-old has played the hapless but loveable Kirk on the ITV soap since 2000.

Andrew with his wife Nicola Willis (Picture: Getty)

He’s no stranger to reality TV shows having competed on Dancing On Ice in 2012.

If Andrew does step into the jungle, he will be the latest in a long line of Coronation Street stars to do so.

Other former contestants from the soap include Chris Bisson, Antony Cotton, Helen Flanagan, Jennie McAlpine and Sair Khan.

As we get closer and closer to the new series, set to return later this year, we have compiled a handy round-up of all the famous faces rumoured to head to the jungle.

Capital FM DJ Roman Kemp recently refused to deny claims that he’s signed up, while Good Morning Britain’s Kate Garraway has been very coy about it too.

Presenters Ant McPartlin and Declan Donnelly will be back together on the show as Ant stepped down from the last series in the wake of his drink-driving arrest.

I’m A Celebrity…Get Me Out Of Here! returns to ITV in November.

description: Coronation Street star Andrew Whyment 'signs up for I'm A Celebrity Get Me Out Of Here 2019'
